title: Kikattava Kakkiainen
overview: Kikattava Kakkiainen, despite his small size, is a big hero with a captivating gift of laughter. It's catchy and puts everyone in a good mood. Kakkiainen's cheerful attitude to life is especially helpful to his friends Keijo Karhulle, Herra Hirvelle, Neiti Siilille and City Kanille who live in Havunhelman forest, who get into the strangest situations out of habit. Kakkiainen appears at the right moment to save the friends from the pit. It helps to see how perseverance and a positive attitude are the solutions to many problems.
